); } export default function Navbar() { const [showPopup, setShowPopup] = useState(false); const handleResumeClick = (e) => { // Start download const link = document.createElement("a"); link.href = "/images/RESUME_RAHUL.pdf"; link.download = "RESUME_RAHUL.pdf"; document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); // Show popup setShowPopup(true); setTimeout(() => setShowPopup(false), 2600); e.preventDefault(); }; return ( <>
